<TEI xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
<teiHeader xml:lang="en">

<titleStmt>
<title type="main">Dharmottaraṭippanaka</title>
<author/>

</principal>

</respStmt>
<respStmt>
<resp xml:id="sarit-encoder-dhṭ">prepared for SARIT by</resp>
<persName ref="https://viaf.org/viaf/308710472/">Liudmila Olalde</persName>
</respStmt>
</titleStmt>
<editionStmt>
</editionStmt>
<publicationStmt>

<sourceDesc>
<biblStruct xml:id="dhṭ-yaita-2005">
<analytic>
<title level="a" type="main">The Dharmottaraṭippanaka</title>
<title level="a" type="sub">Critical Edition</title>
</analytic>
<monogr>
<title level="m" type="main">Three Sanskrit Texts from the Buddhis Pramāṇa-Tradition</title>
<title level="m" type="sub">The Hetuvidyā Section in the <title>Yogācārabhūmi</title>, the <title>Darmottaraṭippanaka</title>, and the <title>Tarkarahasya</title></title>
<editor key="Yaita" ref="http://viaf.org/viaf/285797233">
<persName>
<forename>Hideomi</forename>
<surname>Yaita</surname>
</persName>
</editor>
<imprint>
<publisher>Naritasan Shinshoji</publisher>
<pubPlace>Narita</pubPlace>
<date when="2005">2005</date>
</imprint>
<biblScope unit="pp" from="128" to="260">128-260</biblScope>
</monogr>
</biblStruct>
<listWit>
<head>List of manuscripts consulted by Yaita.<note>For a description see <ref target="#dhṭ-yaita-2005">Three Sanskrit Texts from the Buddhis Pramāṇa-Tradition</ref>, Appendix 2.</note></head>
<witness xml:id="dhṭ-ms-A">A: Jesalmer Cat., No. 370. </witness>
<witness xml:id="dhṭ-ms-B">B: jesalmer Cat., No. 371. </witness>
<witness xml:id="dhṭ-ms-P">P: Pattan Cat., No. 58(9).</witness>
</listWit>
</sourceDesc>
</fileDesc>
<encodingDesc>
<editorialDecl>
<list>
<item>Quotations from Dharmottara's Nyāyabinduṭīkā (NBT) or Dharmakīrti's Nyāyabindu (NB) were enclosed in <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><q ana="nb(ṭ)" /></egXML>.</item>
<item>Vowel merging has been separated and is indicated with "+" between the vowels.</item>
<item>Hyphens were used to separate compound elements only when he thought that it would be easier to understand the tex.</item>
<item>Page numbers from <ref target="#dhṭ-yaita-2005">Yaita 2005</ref> were encoded as pb-elements with the ed-attribute "hy".</item>

<item>In the <ref target="#dhṭ-yaita-2005">print edition</ref>, the folio numbers of the manuscripts consulted by Yaita are given both on the margins and inline. In this file the folio numbers were encoded only once as inline pb-elements with and edRef-attribute.</item>
<item>Line breaks from <ref target="#dhṭ-yaita-2005">Yaita 2005</ref> were encoded as lb-elements with the ed-attribute "hy".</item>

<item>In the <ref target="#dhṭ-yaita-2005">print edition</ref>, the line numbers of the main manuscript followed by Yaita are given both on the margins and inline. In this file these line numbers encoded only once as inline lb-elements with their corresponding edRef-attribute.</item>
<item>Passages in italics were enclosed in <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><hi rend="italics" /></egXML></item>
<item>Round brackets were encoded as <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><hi rend="brackets" /></egXML></item>
<item>Double quotes were encoded as <gi>quote</gi></item>

<item>Underlined passages in the text were enclosed in <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><hi rend="underline" /></egXML>. These mark sometimes quotations from NB. In other occasions they are used to mark names.<!-- this should be fixed --></item>

<item>In the notes, quotations from NBT passages, i.e. identical passages between NBT and Dharmottaraṭippanaka (underlined in the print edition), were enclosed in <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><seg ana="nbṭ=dhṭ" /></egXML></item>

<item>In the notes, parallel passages between Dharmottaraṭippanaka and Tātparya (underlined with dots in the print edition "...." were enclosed in <egXML xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/Examples"><seg ana="parallel_dhṭ-tāniṭ" /></egXML>.</item>
</list>

In the print edition there were no footnote references; instead, the footnotes in the book point to the line on the corresponding page. Sometimes a note has annotations to several items (words, syllables) on the same line. In this file the footnotes were located manually in the text by te SARIT encoder. When several items are commented in the note, the note was located at the beginning of the first item.
</editorialDecl>

List of abbreviations. The abbreviations in the first column appear in the print edition of the text. The abbreviations in brackets are used in the attributes ed, cRef and xml:id's in this file. Unless otherwise indicated, references are by page and line number of the edition consulted by Yaita.:
<table ana="abbreviations">
<row><cell>Abbreviations used by Yaita</cell><cell>Abbreviaitons used in the xml-file for cRef- and ana-attributes</cell><cell>Text</cell></row>
<row><cell>AA</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">Pā</hi></cell><cell>Pāṇini, Aṣṭādhyāyī</cell></row>
<row><cell>AK</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">ak</hi></cell><cell>Vasubandhu, Abhidharmakośa</cell></row>
<row><cell>AKBh</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">akbh</hi></cell><cell>Vasubadhu, Abhidharmakośabhāṣya</cell></row>
<row><cell>DhPr</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">dp</hi></cell><cell>Durvekamiśra, Dharmottarapradīpa</cell></row>
<row><cell>DhT</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">dhṭ</hi></cell><cell>Mallavādin, Dharmottaraṭippanaka</cell></row>
<row><cell>HB</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">hb</hi></cell><cell>Dharmakīrti, Hetubindu</cell></row>
<row><cell>NB</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nb</hi></cell><cell>Dharmakīrti, Nyāyabindu</cell></row>
<row><cell>NB-T</cell><cell>nb-Tib</cell><cell>Dhramakīrti, Nyāyabindu (Tibetan translation)</cell></row>
<row><cell>NBT</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nbṭ</hi></cell><cell>Dharmottara, Nyāyabinduṭīkā</cell></row>
<row><cell>NBT-B</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nbṭ-Stcherbatsky</hi></cell><cell>Dharmottara, Nyāyabinduṭīkā</cell></row>
<row><cell>NBT-T</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nbṭ-Tib</hi></cell><cell>Dharmottara, Nyāyabinduṭīkā</cell></row>
<row><cell>NBTT</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nbṭṭ</hi></cell><cell>Anonymous, Nyayabinduṭīkāṭippaṇī</cell></row>
<row><cell>NBT-Vi</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">nbṭ-Vi</hi></cell><cell>Vinītadeva, Nyāyabinduṭīkā</cell></row>
<row><cell>PS</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">ps</hi></cell><cell>Dignāga, Pramāṇasamuccaya</cell></row>
<row><cell>PV</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">pv</hi></cell><cell>Dharmakīrti, Pramāṇavārttika</cell></row>
<row><cell>PVSV</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">pvsv</hi></cell><cell>Dharmakīrti, Pramāṇavārttikasvavṛtti</cell></row>
<row><cell>R</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">rnā</hi></cell><cell>Ratnakīrtinibandhāvali</cell></row>
<row><cell>Tātparya</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">tāniṭ</hi></cell><cell>Tātparyanibandhanaṭippana, anonymous commentary on Nyāyabinduṭīkā</cell></row>
<row><cell>TR</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">tara</hi></cell><cell>Tarkarahasya</cell></row>
<row><cell>TSP</cell><cell><hi rend="brackets">tsp</hi></cell><cell>Kamalaśīla,Tattvasaṅgrahapañjikā </cell></row>
UṇSusūUṇādisūtra
</encodingDesc>
<revisionDesc>
<change when="2017-04-12" who="https://viaf.org/viaf/308710472/">Corrected "gñ" to "gjñ" in Sanskrit passages (mostly in "-samyagjñā-")</change>
<change when="2017-04-13" who="https://viaf.org/viaf/308710472/">Corrected " ñ" and ">ñ" to " jñ" and ">jñ in Sanskrit passages</change>
</revisionDesc>
</teiHeader>
<text xml:lang="sa-Latn">
<front resp="#sarit-encoder-dhṭ">
<div>

<head>References<note>This list is based on <bibl>Hideomi Yaita, "Bibliography and Abbreviations," in Three Sanskrit Texts from the Buddhis Pramāṇa-Tradition. The Hetuvidyā Section in the Yogācārabhūmi, the Darmottaraṭippanaka, and the Tarkarahasya (Narita: Naritasan Shinshoji 2005), pp. 457-476</bibl>.</note></head>
Unless otherwise indicated, references are by page and line number of the edition consulted by Yaita.
<list>
<head>Primary Sources</head>
<label>AA</label>
<item>Pāṇini, Aṣṭādhyāyī. <bibl>Böhtlingk, O., ed. 1977. Pāṇini's Grammatik, Abteilung I, Kyoto (repr.)</bibl>.</item>
<label>AK</label>
<item>Vasubandhu, Abhidharmakośa. <bibl>Pradhan, P., ed. 1967. Abhidharmakośabhāṣyam of Vasubandhu. TSWS 8, Patna.</bibl></item>

namo jinamatāya||
<pb ed="hy" n="1"/>

NB 1

NB I s.1: samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate. NBT 5,1: samyagjñānapūrviketyādināsya* prakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanam ucyate. * NBT-B adds sarva and reads: samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvetyādināsya.

samyagjñānetyādi. nanu anyad api sambhāvyate kim api yena+

etadvyavacchedāyābhidheyagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity āśaṅkyāha

NBT 7,1: dvividhaṃ hi prakaraṇaśarīram, śabdo 'rthaś ca.

dvividhaṃNBT 7,1 hītyādi. śarīram iti svabhāvaḥ. arthaś ceti caśabdaḥ

samuccaye. nanu yadi

A: dvividhaprakaraśarīraṃ. P: …broken… prakaraṇaśarīraṃ.

dvividhaṃ prakaraṇaśarīram, tarhi dvayor

api prayojanaṃ nirūpyatām ity āha

A: tatraiveti. P: broken. I omit eva because it does not make sense in this context. Cf. NBT 7,2: tatra śabdasya svābhidheyapratipādanam eva prayojanam, nānyat. atas tan na nirūpyate. Cf. NBT-T: de la sgra'i dgos pa ni…

tatreti, tayoḥ śabdābhidheyayor

madhye.

athā…āha: Quoted by Malvania in fn. 4 at DhPr p.7.

athābhidheyasyāpi kiṃ prayojanābhidhānenety āha+NBT 7,3abhidheyam ityādi.

NBT 7,3-4: abhidheyaṃ tu yadi niṣprayojanaṃ syāt, tadā tatpratipattaye śabdasandarbho 'pi nārambhaṇīyaḥ syāt.

NBT 7,3śabdasandarbho 'pīty

apiśabdād…'pi: Quoted by Malvania in fn. 8 at DhPr p.7. Cf. NBTT 4,4: apiśabdād arthasaṃdarbho 'pi gṛhyate.

apiśabdād arthasandarbho

'pīty arthaḥ. NBT 8,2tasmād ityādi: yasmād

yat. A: ya. P: broken.

yat prayojanarahitaṃ

NBT 8,1-2: …na tatparīkṣā+ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā. tasmād asya prakaraṇasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatābhidheyaprayojanam anenocyate.

na
<q ana="nb(ṭ)"><lb edRef="#dhṭ-ms-A" n="3"/>tatparīkṣā</q>rabhyate <q ana="nb(ṭ)">prekṣāvatā tasmāt</q> kāraṇād iti sambandhaḥ.<lb ed="hy"/>

NBT 8,2anenety

ādivākya = NB I s.1. Cf. Tātparya 3b: tasmād iti: yasmād abhidheyaṃ niḥprayojanaṃ, na tatparīkṣā+āraṃbhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā tasmād asyetyādi. darśayatā kathayatā. anenety ādivākyena.

ādivākyena. evaṃ ca sthite yādṛśo 'sya vākyārtho bhavati

tādṛśaṃ darśayati NBT 8,2

NBT 8,2-3: yasmāt samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ, tasmāt tatpratipattaya* idam ārabhyata ity ayam atra vākyārthaḥ. *NBT-B: tatpratipattyartham. Cf. Tātparya 3b: tatpratipattaya iti samyagjñānapratipattaye. atreti ādivākye…

yasmād ityādineti. NBT 8,3tatpratipattaye+ iti sam
<pb ed="hy" n="2"/>
yagjñānapratipattaye. itir evaṃprakāre. NBT 8,4atrety ādivākye.

Malvania quotes similar passages from Ṭi sic. in fn.1 at DhPr p.9: nanu abhidheyaprayojanābhidhāne pi…kim uttaram ity āha asmiṃś cārthe.

nanu yadi nāmābhidheyaprayojanam uktaṃ tathāpi yāvac chāstrasya
sambandhādīni noktāni bhavanti tāvat prekṣāvatāṃ tatra pravṛttir na<lb ed="hy"/>

prāpnotīty āśaṅkyāha

NBT 8,4: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanam uktam.

atra cetyādi. atrety ādivākye. yady apy
<q ana="nb(ṭ)">abhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ<lb ed="hy"/>

prayojanam, tathāpīdam asmadabhihitasya nottarībhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkyāha+NBT 9,1

NBT 9.1: asmiṃś cārtha ucyamāne sambandhaprayojanābhidheyāny uktāni bhavanti.

asmiṃś cetyādi.

sarva-…uktāni: Quoted by Malvania in fn.1 at DhPr p. 10.

sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetuḥ samyagjñānam,

asminn arthe+ucyamāne kathaṃ

Malvania omits punaḥ.

punaḥ sambandhādīny uktāni

bhavantīty āha NBT 10,1

NBT 10,1f.: tathā hi puruṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam anena prakaraṇeneti bruvatā…ity uktaṃ bhavati. tasmād abhidheya-…

tathā hītyādi. yasmāt puruṣārthopayogi samyagj

A: -jñānavyutpādayitum. P: ityādīty uktaṃ. A: broken.

ñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam ityādy uktaṃ bhavati, NBT 10,4tasmāt

kāraṇād iti saṃbandhaḥ. NBT 10,4

Malvania: nanvādivākye.

nanv…na vaktīty āha: Quoted by Malvania in fn.2 at DhPr. p. 10.

nanv ādivākyaṃ yathābhidheyaprayojanam

abhidhatte, evaṃ

A: sambandhā kim. P & Malvania: sambandhādi kim.

sambandhādi kim iti na vaktīty āha NBT 10,4

NBT 10,4-6: na tv idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ sambandham abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham, ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sāmarthyād darśayati.

na tv ityādi.

yadi…taddarśane ityāha: Quoted by Malvania in fn.3 at DhPr p.10. Cf. Tātparya 4a: yadi sākṣān na samarthaṃ katham samartham ity āha ekaṃ tu…

yadi sākṣān na vakti, kathaṃ tarhi samarthaṃ

Malvania:…taddarśane ity āha…P:…taddarśa…broken…ha ekam ityādi. samarthya-. A: samarthataddarśana…broken…marthya-.

taddarśanam ity
<pb ed="hy" n="3"/>

āha NBT 10,5ekam ityādi. sāmarthyalabdhāny api NB 1

NB I s.1:…tad vyutpādyate. NBT 11,1: tad ity abhidheyapadam. vyutpādyata iti prayojanapadam.

tad ityādinā Dharmakīrtiḥ

Malvania quotes the following passage from Ṭi sic.: atha vārttikena sāmarthyalabdham abhidheyaṃ prayojanaṃ cāha See fn.4 at DhPr p.10.
spaṣṭīkaroti.

Cf. Tātparya 4a: nanu tadvyutpattih kriyata iti yuktaṃ vaktum, tat kim iti ṇicā nirddeśyata ity āśaṅkya ṇicā nirdeśasya phalam āha prayojanaṃ cātretyādi. Cf. NBTT 4,15-16: kim iti tad vyutpādyata iti ṇicā nirdeśa iti. tatphalam āha prayojanaṃ cātretyādi.

nanu ca tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata ity āstāṃ kiṃ ṇico nirdeśenety āha

NBT 11,1

NBT 11,1f.: prayojanaṃ cātra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate, śrotuś ca śravaṇavyāpārasya. tathā hi sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanam…

prayojanam ityādi. na hi ṇicam antareṇa dvayor vyāpārasya

prayojanaṃ labhyata ity arthaḥ. tatra vyutpadyante śiṣyāḥ samyagjñānam,

A: tāṃ na vyutpadyamānācāryaḥ.

tān vyutpadyamānān ācāryaḥ prakaraṇavyāpāreṇa prayuṅkte.

iti ṇici kṛte karmaṇyātma

All A,B,P: neyaṇicarūpam idam. B8a begins with neyaṇicarūpam idam.

nīyaṃ ṇicarūpam idaṃ. yathā dvayor api
vyāpārasya prayojanaṃ tathā darśayati NBT 11,3tathā hītyādinā.

nanu yathābhidheya-…sambandhādisic. darśyatām ity āha: Quoted by Malvania in fn.1 at DhPr p. 12. A:…yathābhidheyasya prayojane.

nanu yathābhidheyaprayojane darśite+evaṃ sambandho 'pi

darśyatām ity āha NBT 12,1

NBT 12,1f.: sambandhapradarśanapadaṃ tu na vidyate, sāmarthyād eva tu sa pratipattavyaḥ. prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya…

sambandhetyādi. kathaṃ tarhi jñātavya ity

āha

A: sāmarthasic.…broken…thaṃ sāmarthyād ava°.

NBT 12,1sāmarthyād ityādi. kathaṃ sāmarthyād avagantavya ity āha

NBT 12,2prekṣāvatetyādi.

NBT 13,3-14,1: aśrute prakaraṇe kathitāny api na niścīyante. ukteṣu tv apramāṇakeṣv apy abhidheyādiṣu saṃśaya utpadyate, saṃśayāc ca pravartante. artha- saṃśayo 'pi hi pravṛttyaṅgaṃ prekṣāvatām. anarthasaṃśayo 'pi nivṛttyaṅgam. ata eva śāstrakāreṇaiva…

NBT 13,3kathitāny apīty apiśabdād akathitānīty arthaḥ.

tarhi kimartham ucyanta ity āha <q ana="nb(ṭ)"><ref cRef="nbṭ.p13,3" rend="superscript">NBT 13,3</ref>ukteṣv</q> ityādi. yadi nāma<lb ed="hy"/>

saṃśaya utpadyate kim ata ity āha NBT 13,4saṃśaye+ ityādi. nanu yadi

āha+<q ana="nb(ṭ)"><ref cRef="nbṭ.p13,4" rend="superscript">NBT 13,4</ref>arthe</q>tyādi. na kevalam arthaniścaya ity <q ana="nb(ṭ)">api</q>śabdārthaḥ.<lb ed="hy"/>
<q ana="nb(ṭ)"><ref cRef="nbṭ.p14,1" rend="superscript">NBT 14,1</ref>anarthasaṃśayo 'pīti:</q> na kevalam anarthaniścaya ity arthaḥ. <q ana="nb(ṭ)"><lb edRef="#dhṭ-ms-A" n="5"/>ata<lb ed="hy"/>
eva<ref cRef="nbṭ.p14,1:" rend="superscript">NBT 14,1:</ref></q> yata evokteṣu satsu saṃśaya utpadyate <q ana="nb(ṭ)">ata eva</q> kāraṇād ity<lb ed="hy"/>
arthaḥ.

Cf. Tātparya 5b: śāstrakāreṇaiveti, evakāreṇa vyākhyātṝṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ.

śāstrakāreṇaivety atra kimartha evaśabda ity āha

NBT 14,2f.: *vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi vacanaṃ krīḍādyartham** anyathāpi sambhāvyate. śāstrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītābhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmo nāpi pravṛttim. atas teṣu saṃśayo yuktaḥ. anukteṣu tu pratipattṛbhir …aśakyānuṣṭhānaṃ vā jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśavad. *NBT-B2,20: ākhyātṝṇāṃ. ** NBT-B ibid.: krīḍārtham

bhavatu nāmaitāvad

A: dūṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavanā.

dūṣaṇasambhāvanā ko doṣa iti ced āha+

NBT 15,1f.: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsv ekasyām apy anarthasambhāvanāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante. *abhidheyādiṣu tūkteṣv arthasaṃbhāvanā+anarthasambhāvanāviruddhā+utpadyate. tayā prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante iti prekṣāvatām …*NBT-B3,2: ukteṣu tv abhidheyādiṣv artha-. DhT: ukteṣv ityādi accords with the reading of NBT-B. But cp. Tātparya 7a: tataś…evety āha abhidheyādiṣv ityādi. Cf. NBT-T5,12: brjod par bya ba la sogs pa smras na ni…

ityādi.

NBT 29,1f.: arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yady api sākṣāt prāptihetuḥ* tathāpi tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. yatraiva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkās tat parīkṣyate. arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. *NBT: prāptiḥ. NBT-T suggests prāptihetuḥ.: phrad pa'i rgyu yin mod kyi 9,17. Ms. C reads prāptihetuḥ See DhPr p.29. NBT-B: arthakriyānirbhāsāt tu…prāptiḥ. It is noteworthy that DhPr 29,7f. clearly suggests that there were such two kinds of variant reading. Also cf. Tātparyā4a: sākṣāt prāptir iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ.

NBT 250,3f.: iha parārthānumāne parasmād arthaḥ pratipattvyaḥ. sa śuddho 'pi svato yadi pareṇāśuddhaḥ khyāpyate sa…prakāśitaś ca hetuḥ. ato vaktur aparādhād api parārthānumāne hetur dṛṣṭānto vā duṣṭaḥ syād api. na ca sādṛśyād asādṛśyād vā sādhyapratipattiḥ, api tu sādhyaniyatād dhetoḥ. ataḥ…sa tathokto dṛṣṭāntena siddho darśayitavyaḥ. tasmād dṛṣṭānto nāmānvayavyatirekavākyārthapradarśanaḥ. na ceha vyatirekavākyaṃ prayuktam. ato vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ihāsādṛśyamātreṇa sādhaka upanyastaḥ. na ca tathā sādhakaḥ. vyatirekaviṣayatvena sa sādhakaḥ, na ca tathopanyasta iti…

iti Dharmottaraṭippanake śrīMallavādyācārya

With -kṛte or around there ends Ms.B fol.77a, and fol.77b is not available to us.

kṛte tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ. maṅgalaṃ mahāśrīḥ.

There is a folio consisting of only a line, in our photoprint. The script in it looks like same as that in the fol. 83b and is different from that of the previous leaves of Ms. P. It is not regarded as the P fol. 83a in the Patan Catalogue p.375. The line reads something like this:…?dārakiraṭivāsacaśiraḥ| ka…?…lālapatraśriyaṃ| pratyatojvalapāṇijayutilasaktiṃjalkala. The letters are often illegible.

saṁvat 1231 varṣe bhādrapadaśudi 12 ravau adyeha jaṃtrāvaligrāmavāstavya

paṃo prabhādityasutapaṃ ◦ jogesvareṇa pustakaṃ likhitam iti|
<lg>
